projects.name: Food Demand Forecasting
projects.description: Time-series model to forecast food demand with high accuracy. Implemented MLOps pipeline to enhance efficiency. Improved prediction accuracy, optimizing inventory management and reducing food wastage.

projects.name: Calpred
projects.description: Calorie prediction framework to estimate caloric expenditure from workout data. Features real-time tracking, interactive visualization, and data-driven fitness insights.

projects.name: CozyReader
projects.description: AI-powered bedtime storyteller that crafts personalized stories based on child preferences. Features custom characters, themes, and locally hosted text-to-speech voices.
